overview: A young American Indian boy named Vikram travels to India to locate his missing father and uncovers a series of shocking revelations about his family. Yearning to know more about his paternal ancestry, Vikram discovers that his father's life was far more complex and storied than he ever could have imagined. Avtar Gill, Sarbjit Mangat and Jaswant Daman also star in director Harbux Latta's searing drama
title: Babal Da Vehra
